title: ARAM Rerolls
body: So, I reroll'd a champ on aram and I'm using my low level account(I realized that it really takes a bomb ass long of a time to gather enough points to acquire a reroll)  and someone dodged the game! Tell me why I get into another game and my reroll is gone? I have dealt with playing champions I wasn't in the mood to play for about 12 matches straight and finally get the reroll for a chance to get someone Ill probably enjoy....and *poof* it's gone. I'm sad now.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Under normal circumstances, if you're solo, anyone dodging will refund the reroll you used in the previous champ select. Were you in a premade with the person that dodged the match? If someone in your premade dodges, you won't be refunded the reroll from the last champ select.

Yea I was....but I didn't know that this was a thing. Is this said somewhere in any description or is it only on the website? Pre-game information is nice. "Oh, if you dodge this lobby then you will not only gain a wait time but you will also possibly strip earned rewards from others you pair yourself up with. Take this into consideration before you Start a Queue and decide to Leave." RiP My feelings. Now I have to face the struggle. {{item:3070}} Also: Thanks for getting back with me about it so quickly, it's makes me feel nice. :)

Our [queue dodging guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)goes over penalties for dodging in a match. It doesn't **specifically** state in plain language that "if you're in a premade and someone in it dodges, you'll lose any rerolls", but the system sees it as your *premade* group is dodging, therefore rerolls are forfeited. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Oh man, thank you for sending me this. Appreciate the help too! Also, I'm about to post another Help & Support Ticket about missing Ward skins.....Is it ok if I ask you about that here or do you want me to make a new Board post?

Yeah, it's fine to ask additional questions about other things you need help with here. We're aware of and are investigating into a visual issue going on that prevents you from seeing ward skins on your profile or in champ select. This only affects certain wards and is only a visual issue, the wards are still on your account, you just cannot see them at the moment. 

I cannot provide a timeline on when a fix for this will roll out, but let me know if you have any other questions.

Oh ok *Phew* I thought it was just me. Well, you answered all of my questions and helped me understand all of the problems x.x If there was a way to vote the help here on a 5 star scale then I'd definitely hit the 5 star. Really appreciate it!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
